title: "0 Ping" Error
body:
Hi guys,

I am facing an error while starting any game, my ping goes to 0 and I keep getting disconnected and can never enter the game again. During this time my team can't remake as I am online with them, while I am not!

Anyone else facing this issue? Any solution? 

Regards,

replies.body: OH snap, 0 ping is pretty odd tbh. It sounds like something is blocking your network from our servers entirely, often times it's caused by firewalls or antivirus. [**Check out these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq3), and be sure to test it in a custom game first.
Hi Broporo, this worked for me, I don't have this issue anymore. Thanks a lot brother {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
